@graph.rdfs:comment: Data model for solid waste management bins.
@graph.rdfs:label: WmgmtBin

@graph.rdfs:comment: Location associated with a resource Item (a spatial point), a group of resource items (a spatial region) or even an observation in case of a mobile sensor.
@graph.rdfs:label: location

@graph.rdfs:comment: Gives the ID of the RFID reader.
@graph.rdfs:label: RFID

@graph.rdfs:comment: Current level of waste in the bin. Typically, the level is specified in terms of percentage volume filled.
@graph.rdfs:label: binFillingLevel

@graph.rdfs:comment: Time when the bin was last cleared.
@graph.rdfs:label: binClearedTime

@graph.rdfs:comment: ID of the waste carrying bin
@graph.rdfs:label: binID

@graph.rdfs:comment: Ward ID corresponding to this observation.
@graph.rdfs:label: wardID

@graph.rdfs:comment: Describes the information of the waste bin device, sensor in consideration
@graph.rdfs:label: wasteBinInfo

@graph.rdfs:comment: Time when the bin's level was last logged.
@graph.rdfs:label: binLoggedTime

@graph.rdfs:comment: Data models that pertain to the waste management domain
@graph.rdfs:label: WasteManagement

@graph.rdfs:comment: Data models that pertain to the waste management domain
@graph.rdfs:label: WasteManagement

@graph.rdfs:comment: Class of all Data Models.
@graph.rdfs:label: DataModel

@graph.rdfs:comment: Class of all Data Models.
@graph.rdfs:label: DataModel

@graph.rdfs:comment: URI pointing to the data-descriptor entity
@graph.rdfs:label: dataDescriptor

@graph.rdfs:comment: URI pointing to the data-descriptor entity
@graph.rdfs:label: dataDescriptor

@graph.rdfs:comment: Most generic IUDX object.
@graph.rdfs:label: Thing

@graph.rdfs:comment: Most generic IUDX object.
@graph.rdfs:label: Thing

@graph.rdfs:comment: Description for an IUDX thing.
@graph.rdfs:label: description

@graph.rdfs:comment: Category/type of the waste container bin. It can be a household bin or a dumpster or any other pre-defined category/type.
@graph.rdfs:label: binCategory

@graph.rdfs:comment: Maximum load (weight) that the waste bin can hold.
@graph.rdfs:label: binMaxLoad

@graph.rdfs:comment: The fullness threshold level of the bin defined as the level (in terms of percentage) when the bin full alert or notification will be generated.
@graph.rdfs:label: binFullnessThreshold

@graph.rdfs:comment: Total capacity in terms of the volume of waste the bin can hold.
@graph.rdfs:label: binCapacity

@graph.rdfs:comment: Color of the bin. Could be used for indicating the type of waste. The color coding should follow the conventions applicable to the geographical area the bins are located.
@graph.rdfs:label: binColor

@graph.rdfs:comment: Recommended load (weight) that the waste bin corresponding to this observation can hold.
@graph.rdfs:label: binRecommendedLoad

@graph.rdfs:comment: Gives the License Plate number of the vehice. SameAs: 'license_plate' field from GTFS Realtime message-VehicleDescriptor (https://developers.google.com/transit/gtfs-realtime/reference#message-vehicledescriptor)
@graph.rdfs:label: license_plate
